Description:
An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With 7-ZIP
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% a %' or command like '% u %') and (description like '%7-zip%' and (process_path like '%\7z.exe' or process_path like '%\7zr.exe' or process_path like '%\7za.exe') and (original_file_name = '7z.exe' or original_file_name = '7za.exe')) and command like '% -p%')
